O=
n Thu, Jan 13, 2011 at 8:05 AM, Mike Forsberg <bigmike.f@...> wrote:
=

> Traditionally, it is common place to not redistribute JUnit.  Most produ=
cts

ars are

ributing the code, I'm no lawyer, but I'd think you'd be

equired to distribute your tests?

>> Hello JUni=
t guys.

t

nit is necessary part of
